   "source": [
    "# 1A\n",
    "def PatternCount(text, pattern):\n",
    "    cnt = 0\n",
    "    length = len(pattern)\n",
    "    for i in range(len(text) - len(pattern) + 1):\n",
    "        if text[i:i+length] == pattern:\n",
    "            cnt += 1\n",
    "    return cnt\n",
    "\n",
    "text = ''\n",
    "pattern = 'AGGGGATAG'\n",
    "\n",
    "print(PatternCount(text, pattern))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 25,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "CTTTCACTTGGTA\tTTTCACTTGGTAG\tTTCACTTGGTAGA\tTCACTTGGTAGAC\tCACTTGGTAGACC\t"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# 1B\n",
    "def FreqWords(text, k):\n",
    "    Patterns = {}\n",
    "    for i in range(len(text) - k + 1):\n",
    "        pattern = text[i:i+k]\n",
    "        count = PatternCount(text, pattern)\n",
    "        Patterns.update({pattern : count})\n",
    "    FreqPatterns = [k for k, v in Patterns.items() if v == max(Patterns.values())]\n",
    "    return FreqPatterns\n",
    "\n",
    "full_text = '''\n",
    "13\n",
    "'''\n",
    "text, k, _ = full_text.split('\\n')\n",
    "k = int(k)\n",
    "\n",
    "# print(text, k)\n",
    "\n",
    "for i in FreqWords(text, k):\n",
    "    print(i, end = '\\t')"
   ]
  }
